message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Considering its value, I propose a price of $14500 for this exceptional item. I believe this is a fair offer that allows us both to benefit.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of the product, $14500 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $13000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to adjust the price. I would like to offer the product to you for $13500. This price reflects the value of the product while also accommodating your financial situation.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $13500 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $13250. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to lower the price to $13375 for the product. This is a fair compromise that respects both our interests.
